resources.string: When this feature is enabled, you can send commands via SMS to perform operations.
When this feature is enabled, you can sign in ZTE ID with a ZTE cloud account and visit ZTE handset service support website to perform operations.
SMS anti-theft is enabled, and we will enable network anti-theft
You can use the password to enter enti-theft, setup anti-theft and contorl the lost phone remotely. Please keep it.
When SIM on lost phone is changed, the security number will auto receive SMS to get new phone number for further control remotely
The SIM on my phone is changed. Please save the phone number for this SMS in order to find my phone. Thank you.
This contact has no phone number, please re-select
SMS anti-theft is enabled. Please check commands and back up by sending SMS command
SMS and network anti-theft are enabled
SMS and network anti-theft are enabled. Please check commands and back up by sending SMS command
Network is enabled. You can also enable SMS anti-theft for best results.
The lost phone should have enabled anti-theft
If SIM is changed, the SMS will automatically send to security number
The password was set by original owner
Sign in ZTE ID with a ZTE cloud account
You select to enable network anti-theft, please sign in ZTE ID with a ZTE cloud account first
Please save this anti-theft password for me:
Please back up a website, ZTE network anti-theft:
Remember this website. If your phone is lost, you can visit the website on PC or other phone to perform operations.
The phone is locked. The front camera will auto-capture when incorrect password entered for 3 times continuously to unlock, and send picture to security number.
The phone is locked.User must enter correct anti-theft password to unlock and user the phone.
Even in silence mode, the phone will ring in ultimate volume to help to find your phone. The phone will also be locked, and the alert will dismiss by correct password.
Remotely erase all of user data, including contacts, call logs, messages, email, photos, videos, SD card. And it will format virtual SD card.
The lost phone will send location info and provide a map link for you to find it.
You can use any mobile phone and send this command to current number of lost phone to contorl it remotely
You can only send this command via security number to current number of lost phone and contorl it remotely
Back up commands to security number
Please send \"ZTEczmm*\" via security number to your phone to reset password. The system will generate a random password and send it back to security number.
SMS and network anti-theft are enabled
Your phone has lost protection against theft. Please enable anti-theft now.
Enter anti-theft password or security number to unlock:
You can reset password by sending “ZTEczmm*” to this phone via security number
"I'm using anti-theft now. Please save commands for me, thanks. ZTEabbr*anti-theft password。Here are abbreviations: Lock: sd; Erase: cc; Locate: dw; Ring: xl;"
The command format is incorrect, please retry send
The anti-theft password is incorrect, please send command again
"The command not exists, please send correct command: Lock: sd; Erase: cc; Locate: dw; Ring: xl"
Erase failed, you have to send command via security number.
Error occurred when operating, lock failed
Error occurred when operating, erase failed
Your other data has erased successfully, but it has insufficient permissions to anti-theft application, you must install it in system directory if you want to format SD card.
Error occurred when operating, set failed
Network error, loacte failed, please try it again later!
Your phone is located in: %1$s. You can access %2$s for details.[ZTE anti-theft]
You have to send command via security number to reset password
Auto-capture when entering incorrect password to unlock
It needs to input correct password to unlock
Erase contacts, call logs, messages, email, photos, videos and SD card
Owner could reset password if forgotten
This phone has already bound to an account. Please unbind and switch to other account before operating
The username was signed up on ZTE ID, please update the binding
Error: Username or IMEI already exists!
Your account info was expired, please sign in again.
Youve changed account of ZTE ID, and we suggest you update network anti-theft account as well. Before updating, you can use network anti-theft with previous account.
Youve logged out of the account of ZTE ID. And you can still enable anti-theft with previous account.
Connect to the server failed, please try it again later!
The version is up to date
SD card has no more space, please free up some space before downloaing
You have to install account management components before enabling network anti-theft, install now?
ZTE Account has been forbidden, please enter to Apps settings and start ZTE Account before activating anti-theft Application.
ZTE Account has been forbidden, please enter to Apps settings and start the application。
Your phone is in protected,and you can reset after accessing the auth.
You have opened up Self protection feature of phone anti-theft, are you sure want to close?
To prevent the mobile phone anti-theft is unloaded open
To prevent the mobile phone anti-theft is unloaded closed
If opened the anti-theft password, closing anti uninstall function need to check the anti-theft password
